mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, TEMP.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALROWS FROM ( SELECT MGRNU, MGRNU_IDX, WORK_CDE, TO_CODE('CHG_HISTORY','WORK_CDE',WORK_CDE) AS WORK_CDE_NAM, WORKTM, WORKUSER, WORK_BG FROM GT_A062_P_WORK WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu} AND WORK_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC ) TEMP ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC, MGRNU ASC) TEMP WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{rows} * ( #{page} - 1 ) + 1 AND #{rows}* #{page}
